fields.label: Test ID
fields.name: test_id
fields.hint: Unique identifier for this specific test.

fields.label: Prototype Name
fields.name: prototype_name
fields.hint: Enter the name of the prototype being tested.

fields.label: Prototype MSN
fields.name: prototype_MSN
fields.hint: Unique identifier for the prototype manufacture serial number.

fields.label: Procedure ID
fields.name: procedure_id
fields.hint: Identifier for this test documentation.

fields.label: Test Title
fields.name: test_title
fields.hint: A brief title summarizing the test.

fields.label: Date
fields.name: date
fields.hint: Date the test is performed.

fields.label: Time
fields.name: time
fields.hint: Time the test started.

fields.label: Pilot
fields.name: pilot
fields.hint: Name of the pilot conducting the test.

fields.label: Observer(s)
fields.name: observers
fields.hint: Names of any observers present during the test.

fields.label: Location
fields.name: location
fields.hint: Location where the test is conducted.

fields.label: Weather Conditions
fields.name: weather_conditions
fields.hint: Brief description of weather conditions during the test.

fields.label: Wind Speed and Direction
fields.name: wind_speed_direction
fields.hint: Wind speed (in m/s) and direction during the test.

fields.label: Temperature
fields.name: temperature
fields.hint: Temperature in Celsius at the test location.

fields.label: Online Checklist Result
fields.name: online_checklist_result
fields.hint: Result of the pre-flight online checklist.

fields.label: Start Battery Voltage
fields.name: start_battery_voltage
fields.hint: Voltage of the drone's battery before takeoff, in volts.

fields.label: Flight Mode
fields.name: flight_mode
fields.hint: Flight mode used during the test (e.g., Stabilize, Position, Mission, Manual).

fields.label: Planned Altitude
fields.name: planned_altitude
fields.hint: Planned maximum altitude for the test, in meters.

fields.label: Planned Speed
fields.name: planned_speed
fields.hint: Planned maximum speed for the test, in m/s.

fields.label: Planned Duration
fields.name: planned_duration
fields.hint: Planned duration of the test, formatted as 'minutes:seconds'.

fields.label: Transition Parameters
fields.name: transition_parameters
fields.hint: Specific parameters related to transition tests, if applicable.

fields.label: Start Time
fields.name: start_time
fields.hint: Actual start time of the flight.

fields.label: End Time
fields.name: end_time
fields.hint: Actual end time of the flight.

fields.label: Flight Duration
fields.name: flight_duration
fields.hint: Total duration of the flight, formatted as 'minutes:seconds'.

fields.label: Max Altitude Achieved
fields.name: max_altitude_achieved
fields.hint: Maximum altitude achieved during the flight, in meters.

fields.label: Max Speed Achieved
fields.name: max_speed_achieved
fields.hint: Maximum speed achieved during the flight, in m/s.

fields.label: Significant Events
fields.name: significant_events
fields.hint: Any significant events or observations during the flight.

fields.label: ULog File Name
fields.name: ulog_file_name
fields.hint: Name of the ULog file containing detailed flight data.

fields.label: End Battery Voltage
fields.name: end_battery_voltage
fields.hint: Voltage of the drone's battery after landing, in volts.

fields.label: Notable Observations
fields.name: notable_observations
fields.hint: Any notable observations made during or after the flight.

fields.label: Issues Encountered
fields.name: issues_encountered
fields.hint: Description of any issues encountered during the test.

fields.label: Potential Improvements
fields.name: potential_improvements
fields.hint: Suggestions for potential improvements based on the test results.

fields.label: Next Steps/Action Items
fields.name: next_steps_action_items
fields.hint: Planned next steps or action items following the test.

fields.label: Attachments
fields.name: attachments
fields.hint: Attach any relevant files. You can select multiple files.
